    public class FachRefServlet
extends org.mycore.frontend.servlets.MCRServlet
    Extends the MCRServlet by some functionality to ease the handling of request parameters.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getParameter

        public static java.lang.String getParameter(org.mycore.frontend.servlets.MCRServletJob job,
                                            java.lang.String name)
        Takes the HTTP-Request from the MCRServletJob and retrieves the parameter.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the parameter
        job - MCRServletJob
        name - the name of the parameter from the HTML request
        Returns:
        String the desired parameter from the MCRServletJob. If the parameter is not found,an empty string is returned

      • prepareOutput

        public static org.jdom2.Element prepareOutput(org.mycore.frontend.servlets.MCRServletJob job,
                                              java.lang.String outputName)
        Prepares the basic output with a given root element name and the friendly name and the current timestamp
        Parameters:
        job - MCRServletJob
        outputName - the name of the root element for the output
        Returns:
        an org.jdom2.element acting as root element for the output

                                              java.lang.String outputName,
                                              java.lang.String module)
        Prepares the basic output with a given root element name and the friendly name and the current timestamp
        Parameters:
        job - MCRServletJob

        module - the name of the module

      • prepareOutput

        public static org.jdom2.Element prepareOutput(org.mycore.frontend.servlets.MCRServletJob job,
                                              java.lang.String outputName,
                                              java.lang.String module,
                                              java.lang.String function)
        Prepares the basic output with a given root element name and the friendly name and the current timestamp
        Parameters:
        job - MCRServletJob
        outputName - the name of the root element for the output
        module - the name of the module
        function - the name of the function within the module
        Returns:
        an org.jdom2.element acting as root element for the output

      • sendOutput

        public static void sendOutput(org.mycore.frontend.servlets.MCRServletJob job,
                              org.jdom2.Element output)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                              org.xml.sax.SAXException
        renders and sends the prepared output XML to the HTTP response
        Parameters:
        job - MCRServletJob
        output - org.jdom2.element acting as output
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown while writing the output to the HTTP response
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - thrown while rendering the output element
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - thrown while parsing the output element
